raw_text:
Based on the provided KPI data, I've analyzed the cells and identified C004 as showing degraded performance due to a high number of handover failures (HOF). Here's my recommendation:

{
  "target_cell": "C004",
  "parameter_to_adjust": "ttt",
  "suggested_value": "480",
  "reason": "High HOF count (7) with long TTT (640ms). Reducing TTT to 480ms may improve handover timing and reduce failures."
}

This adjustment aims to address the high handover failure rate in C004 by making the handover process more responsive to changing radio conditions. Lowering the Time-to-Trigger (TTT) from 640ms to 480ms should help initiate handovers more quickly when needed, potentially reducing the number of handover failures.
